content.text: Detect the language and recognize the speech: <|en|>
THE PROOF WAS IN THREE LONG SLIPS I HAD LEFT THEM ALL TOGETHER
Detect the language and recognize the speech: <|en|>
PENELOPE WAS FOUR YEARS OLDER THAN I WAS BUT WE WERE DEVOTED TO EACH OTHER
Detect the language and recognize the speech: <|en|>
IF IT IS DECREED THAT WE DIE TO MORROW LET US DIE BRAVELY LIKE CHRISTIAN MEN READY TO APPEAR WITHOUT TERROR BEFORE THE SUPREME JUDGE
Detect the language and recognize the speech: <|en|>
ENQUIRED ROBIN WITH HIS SUSPICIONS STILL UPON HIM
Detect the language and recognize the speech: <|en|>
I MEAN THAT I DON'T WANT YOU TO BEGIN TO ASK QUESTIONS
Detect the language and recognize the speech: <|en|>
JUST AS THEY TURN MADEIRA INTO PORT IN THE SPACE OF A SINGLE NIGHT SO THIS OLD AIR HAS BEEN TAKEN AND DOCTORED AND TWISTED ABOUT AND BROUGHT OUT AS A NEW POPULAR DITTY INDEED
Detect the language and recognize the speech: <|en|>
I SOON FOUND OUT THAT HE HAD CAUGHT SIGHT OF THE RELIEF ON THE ROAD AND WAS AFRAID TO SHOOT I QUICKLY MADE UP MY MIND
Detect the language and recognize the speech: <|en|>
HE SAT DOWN WEAK BEWILDERED AND ONE THOUGHT WAS UPPERMOST ZORA
Detect the language and recognize the speech: <|en|>
IT SEEMS SUCH A TRAGIC THING
Detect the language and recognize the speech: <|en|>
ALL THE SAME HE ADDED IRRELEVANTLY YOU SHALL HAVE THE LATCH KEY
